contents:
body {
text-align: justify}
Twitter, Facebook, Reddit and other social media platforms represent
a large and largely untapped resource for social data and evidence.The
data in these platforms is vast, contains variety of topics that people
discuss on the daily basis regardless of geographical location. This
data that is generated on the daily basis provides a key/main source of
information for anyone who wants to study science, communication, people
opinions and situations happening across the world at the same time.
These platforms provide data through number of applicatyion
Programming Interfaces(API). Although it may be diificult or sometimes
not possible to obtain data from these platforms, they help in
qualitative and quantitative research.
Covid-19 outbreak was nothing less than the biggest nightmare the
humanity has gone through that has changed the lives of millions
upsidedown in no time and almost everyone have suffered. Even with the
research advancements we see and develop every single day, yet we still
haven’t figured out completely to eliminate the virus. So we adapted
ourselves to live with it but that didn’t happen overnight. In my study
I am trying to collect the voices of people across all borders what they
shared on social media platforms like Twitter, Reddit etc., and
differentiate the data according to the phases of the outbreak while
listing the most common problems that masses faced at each stage and
establish the relation on how the trend shifting happened overtime and
who were most impacted by it.
